scripts.deploy: npm run build -ws --if-present && npm run synth -w cdk && npm run deploy -w cdk

scripts.deploy:backend: npm run build -w backend -w cdk && npm run synth:backend -w cdk && npm run deploy:backend -w cdk && npm run graphql-codegen
scripts.deploy:backend:alpha: npm run build -w backend -w cdk && npm run synth:backend:alpha -w cdk && npm run deploy:backend:alpha -w cdk && npm run graphql-codegen
scripts.deploy:backend:prod: npm run build -w backend -w cdk && npm run synth:backend:prod -w cdk && npm run deploy:backend:prod -w cdk
